items.value: This is your Demon
These are your Minion(s)
These characters are NOT in play

name: Washerwoman
description: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Townsfolk.

items.value: 1 of 2 players is:

name: Librarian
description: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Outsider. (Or that zero are in play.)

items.value: 1 of 2 players is:

name: Investigator
description: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Minion.

items.value: 1 of 2 players is:

name: Chef
description: You start knowing how many pairs of evil players there are.

items.value: Pairs of evil players:

name: Empath
description: Each night, you learn how many of your 2 alive neighbours are evil.

items.value: How many of your alive neighbors are evil:

name: Fortune Teller
description: Each night, choose 2 players: you learn if either is a Demon. There is a good player that registers as a Demon to you.

items.value: Choose 2 players.

name: Undertaker
description: Each night*, you learn which character died by execution today.

items.value: This character died by execution today:

name: Monk
description: Each night*, choose a player (not yourself): they are safe from the Demon tonight.

items.value:
Choose a player (not yourself):
They are safe from the Demon tonight.

name: Ravenkeeper
description: If you die at night, you are woken to choose a player: you learn their character.

items.value:
Choose a player:
You learn their character.
Their character is:

name: Virgin
description: The 1st time you are nominated, if the nominator is a Townsfolk, they are executed immediately.

name: Slayer
description: Once per game, during the day, publicly choose a player: if they are the Demon, they die.

name: Soldier
description: You are safe from the Demon.

name: Mayor
description: If only 3 players live & no execution occurs, your type wins. If you die at night, another player might die instead.

name: Grandmother
description: You start knowing a good player & their character. If the Demon kills them, you die too.

items.value: Your grandchild is:

name: Sailor
description: Each night, choose an alive player: either you or they are drunk until dusk. You can't die.

items.value: Choose a player

name: Chambermaid
description: Each night, choose 2 alive players (not yourself): you learn how many woke tonight due to their ability.

items.value: Number of players that woke due to their own ability:

name: Exorcist
description: Each night*, choose a player (different to last night): the Demon, if chosen, learns who you are then doesn't wake tonight.

items.value: Choose a player (different from last night).

name: Innkeeper
description: Each night*, choose 2 players: they can't die tonight, but 1 is drunk until dusk.

items.value:
Choose 2 players.
They are protected. One is drunk.

name: Gambler
description: Each night*, choose a player & guess their character: if you guess wrong, you die.

items.value: Choose a player and a character.

name: Gossip
description: Each day, you may make a public statement. Tonight, if it was true, a player dies.

name: Courtier
description: Once per game, at night, choose a character: they are drunk for 3 nights & 3 days.

items.value: Would you like to use your ability?
Select a character to make drunk for 3 nights & 3 days

name: Professor
description: Once per game, at night*, choose a dead player: if they are a Townsfolk, they are resurrected.

items.value: Would you like to use your ability?
Choose a player to resurrect

name: Minstrel
description: When a Minion dies by execution, all other players (except Travellers) are drunk until dusk tomorrow.

name: Tea Lady
description: If both your alive neighbours are good, they can't die.

name: Pacifist
description: Executed good players might not die.

name: Fool
description: The first time you die, you don't.

name: Clockmaker
description: You start knowing how many steps from the Demon to its nearest Minion.

items.value: The Demon is
step(s) to its nearest Minion.

name: Dreamer
description: Each night, choose a player (not yourself or Travellers): you learn 1 good and 1 evil character, 1 of which is correct.

items.value: Choose a player
They are:
Or

name: Snake Charmer
description: Each night, choose an alive player: a chosen Demon swaps characters & alignments with you & is then poisoned.

items.value:
Choose a player.

If that player is the Demon:
Swap characters and alignments.
You are:
You are:
evil
You are:
snake_charmer
You are:
good

name: Mathematician
description: Each night, you learn how many players’ abilities worked abnormally (since dawn) due to another character's ability.

items.value: Number of player abilities that malfunctioned due to other abilities.

name: Flowergirl
description: Each night*, you learn if a Demon voted today.

name: Town Crier
description: Each night*, you learn if a Minion nominated today.

items: A Minion did not nominate today

name: Oracle
description: Each night*, you learn how many dead players are evil.

items.value: Number of dead evil players:

name: Savant
description: Each day, you may visit the Storyteller to learn 2 things in private: 1 is true & 1 is false.

name: Seamstress
description: Once per game, at night, choose 2 players (not yourself): you learn if they are the same alignment.

items.value: Would you like to use your ability?

Choose 2 players:
You learn if they are the same alignment.

name: Philosopher
description: Once per game, at night, choose a good character: gain that ability. If this character is in play, they are drunk.

items.value: Would you like to use your ability?

Choose a good character:
Gain that ability.
If this character is in play, they are drunk.

name: Artist
description: Once per game, during the day, privately ask the Storyteller any yes/no question.

name: Juggler
description: On your 1st day, publicly guess up to 5 players' characters. That night, you learn how many you got correct.

items.value: Number of correct juggles:

name: Sage
description: If the Demon kills you, you learn that it is 1 of 2 players.

items.value:
The Demon has killed you.

You learn 1 of 2 players, one of which is that Demon.

name: Noble
description: You start knowing 3 players, 1 and only 1 of which is evil.

items.value: You start knowing 3 players, 1 and only 1 of which is evil.

name: Bounty Hunter
description: You start knowing 1 evil player. If the player you know dies, you learn another evil player tonight. [1 Townsfolk is evil]

items.value: This player is evil.

name: Pixie
description: You start knowing 1 in-play Townsfolk. If you were "mad" that you were this character, you gain their ability when they die.

items.value: This Townsfolk is in-play:
If you are "mad" that you are this character, you gain their ability when they die.

name: General
description: Each night, you learn which alignment the Storyteller believes is winning: good, evil, or neither.

items.value: This alignment is winning:

name: Preacher
description: Each night, choose a player: a Minion, if chosen, learns this. All chosen Minions have no ability.

items.value:
Choose a player:

A Minion, if chosen, learns this. All chosen Minions have no ability.
This character chose you:
preacher

name: King
description: Each night, if the dead outnumber the living, you learn 1 alive character. The Demon knows who you are.

options.title: Each Night (If the dead outnumber the living)

items.value: This character is in-play:

name: Balloonist
description: Each night, you learn 1 player of each character type, until there are no more types to learn. [+1 Outsider]

items.value: You learn 1 player of each character type.

name: Cult Leader
description: Each night, you become the alignment of an alive neighbour. If all good players choose to join your cult, your type wins.

items.value: Your alignment is:

name: Lycanthrope
description: Each night*, choose a living player: if good, they die, but they are the only player that can die tonight.

items.value:
Choose a living player:

If good, they die, but they are the only player that can die tonight.

name: Amnesiac
description: You do not know what your ability is. Each day, privately guess what it is: you learn how accurate you are.

name: Nightwatchman
description: Once per game, at night, choose a player: they learn who you are.

items.value: Would you like to use your ability?

Choose a player:

They learn who you are.

name: Engineer
description: Once per game, at night, choose which Minions or which Demon is in play.

items.value: Would you like to use your ability?
Which Demon?

OR

Which Minions?

name: Fisherman
description: Once per game, during the day, visit the Storyteller for some advice to help you win.

name: Huntsman
description: Once per game, at night, choose a living player: the Damsel, if chosen, becomes a not-in-play Townsfolk. [+the Damsel]

items.value: Would you like to use your ability?

Choose a living player:

The Damsel, if chosen, becomes a not-in-play Townsfolk.

name: Alchemist
description: You have a not-in-play Minion ability.

items.value: You have this not-in-play Minion ability:

name: Farmer
description: If you die at night, an alive good player becomes a Farmer.

name: Magician
description: The Demon thinks you are a Minion. Minions think you are a Demon.

name: Choirboy
description: If the Demon kills the King, you learn which player is the Demon. [+ the King]

items.value: The Demon is...

name: Poppy Grower
description: Minions & Demons do not know each other. If you die, they learn who each other are that night.

name: Atheist
description: The Storyteller can break the game rules & if executed, good wins, even if you are dead. [No evil characters]

name: Cannibal
description: You have the ability of the recently killed executee. If they are evil, you are poisoned until a good player dies by execution.

name: Butler
description: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): tomorrow, you may only vote if they are voting too.

items.value:
Choose a player (not yourself):
You may only vote when they do.
You voted without your master voting. Don't do this again.

name: Drunk
description: You do not know you are the Drunk. You think you are a Townsfolk character, but you are not.

name: Recluse
description: You might register as evil & as a Minion or Demon, even if dead.

name: Saint
description: If you die by execution, your type loses.

name: Tinker
description: You might die at any time.

name: Moonchild
description: When you learn that you died, publicly choose 1 alive player. Tonight, if it was a good player, they die.

name: Goon
description: Each night, the 1st player to choose you with their ability is drunk until dusk. You become their alignment.

items.value: You are:

name: Lunatic
description: You think you are a Demon, but you are not. The Demon knows who you are & who you choose at night.

name: Mutant
description: If you are "mad" about being an Outsider, you might be executed.

name: Sweetheart
description: When you die, 1 player is drunk from now on.

name: Barber
description: If you died today or tonight, the Demon may choose 2 players (not another Demon) to swap characters.

items.value: Would you like to choose 2 players to swap characters?
Choose 2 players to swap characters.

name: Klutz
description: When you learn that you died, publicly choose 1 alive player: if they are evil, your type loses.

name: Snitch
description: Minions start knowing 3 not-in-play characters.

name: Acrobat
description: Each night*, if either good living neighbour is drunk or poisoned, you die.

name: Puzzlemaster
description: 1 player is drunk, even if you die. If you guess (once) who it is, learn the Demon player, but guess wrong & get false info.

name: Heretic
description: Whoever wins, loses & whoever loses, wins, even if you are dead.

name: Damsel
description: All Minions know you are in play. If a Minion publicly guesses you (once), your type loses.

name: Golem
description: You may only nominate once per game. When you do, if the nominee is not the Demon, they die.

name: Politician
description: If you were the player most responsible for your type losing, you change alignment & win, even if dead.

name: Poisoner
description: Each night, choose a player: they are poisoned tonight and tomorrow day.

items.value:
Choose a player:
They are poisoned.

name: Spy
description: Each night, you see the Grimoire. You might register as good & as a Townsfolk or Outsider, even if dead.

name: Scarlet Woman
description: If there are 5 or more players alive & the Demon dies, you become the Demon. (Travellers don’t count)

name: Baron
description: There are extra Outsiders in play. [+2 Outsiders]

name: Godfather
description: You start knowing which Outsiders are in play. If 1 died today, choose a player tonight: they die. [−1 or +1 Outsider]

items.value:
Choose a player:
They die.

name: Devil's Advocate
description: Each night, choose a living player (different to last night): if executed tomorrow, they don't die.

items.value: Choose a player to protect from execution.

name: Assassin
description: Once per game, at night*, choose a player: they die, even if for some reason they could not.

items.value: Would you like to use your ability?
Who would you like to assassinate?

name: Mastermind
description: If the Demon dies by execution (ending the game), play for 1 more day. If a player is then executed, their type loses.

name: Evil Twin
description: You & an opposing player know each other. If the good player is executed, evil wins. Good can't win if you both live.

items.value: Your good twin is:
Your evil twin is:

name: Witch
description: Each night, choose a player: if they nominate tomorrow, they die. If just 3 players live, you lose this ability.

items.value: Choose a player, if they nominate tomorrow they die immediatley.

name: Cerenovus
description: Each night, choose a player & a good character: they are "mad" they are this character tomorrow, or might be executed.

items.value:
Choose a player & a good character:

They are "mad" they are this character tomorrow, or might be executed.
This character chose you:
cerenovus
You are "mad" that you are:

name: Pit-Hag
description: Each night*, choose a player & a character they become (if not-in-play). If a Demon is made, deaths tonight are arbitrary.

items.value:
Choose a player & a character they become.

If a Demon is made, deaths tonight are arbitrary.
You are:
You are:

name: Widow
description: On your 1st night, look at the Grimoire and choose a player: they are poisoned. 1 good player knows a Widow is in play.

name: Fearmonger
description: Each night, choose a player. If you nominate & execute them, their type loses. All players know if you choose a new player.

items.value:
Choose a player:

If you nominate & execute them, their type loses. All players know if you choose a new player.

name: Psychopath
description: Each day, before nominations, you may publicly choose a player: they die. If executed, you only die if you lose roshambo.

name: Goblin
description: If you publicly claim to be the Goblin when nominated & are executed that day, your type wins.

name: Mezepheles
description: You start knowing a secret word. The 1st good player to say this word becomes evil that night.

items.value: Your secret word is:
You are Evil.

name: Marionette
description: You think you are a good character but you are not. The Demon knows who you are. [You neighbour the Demon]

name: Boomdandy
description: If you are executed, all but 3 players die. 1 minute later, the player with the most players pointing at them dies.

name: Imp
description: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If you kill yourself this way, a Minion becomes the Imp.

items.value:
Choose a player:
They die.

If you kill yourself this way, a Minion becomes the Imp.

name: Zombuul
description: Each night*, if no-one died today, choose a player: they die. The 1st time you die, you live but register as dead.

items.value:
Choose a player:
They die.

name: Pukka
description: Each night, choose a player: they are poisoned. The previously poisoned player dies then becomes healthy.

items.value:
Choose a players:
They are poisoned.

The previously poisoned player dies then becomes healthy.

name: Shabaloth
description: Each night*, choose 2 players: they die. A dead player you chose last night might be regurgitated.

items.value:
Choose 2 players:
They die.

 A dead player you chose last night might be regurgitated.

name: Po
description: Each night*, you may choose a player: they die. If your last choice was no-one, choose 3 players tonight.

items.value:
Choose a player:
They die.

 If your last choice was no-one, choose 3 players tonight.

name: Fang Gu
description: Each night*, choose a player: they die. The 1st Outsider this kills becomes an evil Fang Gu & you die instead. [+1 Outsider]

items.value:
Choose a player:
They die.

The 1st Outsider this kills becomes an evil Fang Gu & you die instead.

name: Vigormortis
description: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Minions you kill keep their ability & poison 1 Townsfolk neighbour. [−1 Outsider]

items.value:
Choose a player:
They die.

Minions you kill keep their ability & poison 1 Townsfolk neighbour.

name: No Dashii
description: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Your 2 Townsfolk neighbours are poisoned.

items.value:
Choose a player:
They die.

name: Vortox
description: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Townsfolk abilities yield false info. Each day, if no-one is executed, evil wins.

items.value:
Choose a player:
They die.

name: Lil' Monsta
description: Each night, Minions choose who babysits Lil' Monsta's token & "is the Demon". A player dies each night*. [+1 Minion]

items.value: Choose a player to babysit Lil' Monsta

name: Lleech
description: Each night*, choose a player: they die. You start by choosing an alive player: they are poisoned - you die if & only if they die.

items.value:
Choose an alive player:

They are poisoned - you die if & only if they die.

Choose a player:
They die.

name: Al-Hadikhia
description: Each night*, choose 3 players (all players learn who): each silently chooses to live or die, but if all live, all die.

items.value:
Choose 3 players:

Each silently chooses to live or die, but if all live, all die.

name: Legion
description: Each night*, a player might die. Executions fail if only evil voted. You register as a Minion too. [Most players are Legion]

name: Leviathan
description: If more than 1 good player is executed, you win. All players know you are in play. After day 5, evil wins.

name: Riot
description: Nominees die, but may nominate again immediately (on day 3, they must). After day 3, evil wins. [All Minions are Riot]

name: Bureaucrat
description: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): their vote counts as 3 votes tomorrow.

items.value:
Each night, choose a player (not yourself):

Their vote counts as 3 votes tomorrow.

name: Thief
description: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): their vote counts negatively tomorrow.

items.value:
Each night, choose a player (not yourself):

Their vote counts negatively tomorrow.

name: Gunslinger
description: Each day, after the 1st vote has been tallied, you may choose a player that voted: they die.

name: Scapegoat
description: If a player of your alignment is executed, you might be executed instead.

name: Beggar
description: You must use a vote token to vote. Dead players may choose to give you theirs. If so, you learn their alignment. You are sober & healthy.

name: Apprentice
description: On your 1st night, you gain a Townsfolk ability (if good), or a Minion ability (if evil).

name: Matron
description: Each day, you may choose up to 3 sets of 2 players to swap seats. Players may not leave their seats to talk in private.

name: Judge
description: Once per game, if another player nominated, you may choose to force the current execution to pass or fail.

name: Bishop
description: Only the Storyteller can nominate. At least 1 opposite player must be nominated each day.

name: Voudon
description: Only you and the dead can vote. They don't need a vote token to do so. A 50% majority is not required.

name: Barista
description: Each night, until dusk, 1) a player becomes sober, healthy and gets true info, or 2) their ability works twice. They learn which.

name: Harlot
description: Each night*, choose a living player: if they agree, you learn their character, but you both might die.

items.value:
Choose a living player:

If they agree, you learn their character, but you both might die.

name: Butcher
description: Each day, after the 1st execution, you may nominate again.

name: Bone Collector
description: Once per game, at night, choose a dead player: they regain their ability until dusk.

items.value: Would you like to use your ability?

Choose a dead player:

They regain their ability until dusk.

name: Deviant
description: If you were funny today, you cannot die by exile.

name: Gangster
description: Once per day, you may choose to kill an alive neighbour, if your other alive neighbour agrees.
